Question
========

A person achieves a score of 7.6 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 6.6 with a standard deviation 0.8. The z-score of the person with 7.6 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.25
* 2.24
* 2.46

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.25: Correct
* 2.24: Incorrect
* 2.46: Incorrect
